articles.title: Ex-PlayStation Boss Shawn Layden Says ‘Exclusivity Is Your Achilles’ Heel’ if Game Costs Exceed $200 Million - IGN
articles.description: Former president and CEO of Sony Interactive Entertainment America, Shawn Layden, has said that when a video game’s costs exceed $200 million, “exclusivity is your Achilles’ heel.”
articles.content: Video game exclusivity is one of the hottest topics within the industry after recent moves by both Microsoft and Sony to release their first-party games on multiple, sometimes rival platforms. This, … [+4918 chars]
